comments.text: I have not received my order yet! M. Jordan

Dear Margaret, Thank you very much for backing IVYCable P6. I understand your concerns, and just like with the first and second generations of IVYCable, we will deliver the rewards on schedule. Once again, thank you for your support of Ivycable! Sincerely Ivycable team

content.title: Fully Funded! Thank You ALL!
content.creator:
Matt Chang
January 21, 2025
content.content:
Hi IVYCable P6 Backers,
Thanks for your support! IVYCable P6 is fully funded within 30 minutes! 
We launched IVYCable Gen1 in 2021, and we are actively making improvements to IVYCable during last 3 years. Let's embrace the new gen of charging now! 
Best,
IVYCable Team
